title: JSON schema for the ASP.NET DebugSettings.json files.

executablePath.description: An absolute path to the to the executable.

commandName.description: The name of the command to call.

commandLineArgs.description: The arguments to pass to the command.

workingDirectory.description: Sets the working directory of the command.

launchBrowser.description: Set to true if the browser should be launched.

launchUrl.description: The relative URL to launch in the browser.

environmentVariables.description: Set the environment variables as key/value pairs.

sdkVersion.description: Sets the version of the SDK.
